We are not to seek to extenuate the consequences of the original apostasy. It is not possible to overstate the degree of alienation from truth and righteousness entered into by those whose souls revolt from God. Satan 


                                    -211- 

will present everything possible in a perverted light, to make of no effect the warnings that should be heeded by the people of God.--Ms 60, 1905, p. 3. ("A Message of Warning," May 21, 1905.) 

Released December 6, 1977.
